section.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
A controller is new to the system and files must be uploaded into the database before it can be used
translation.variant: This controller is new and must upload content before configuring.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The configuration files in the controller itself differ from those in the database.
translation.variant: Content differences detected. Upload contents from controller, download content to controller, or press details for more information.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
There are no files in the controller but there are in the system. The use can only download.
translation.variant: The controller's programming has changed. Please download all content to update programs in the controller.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The controller has configuration files but the system does not. The use can only upload.
translation.variant: The controller has not been uploaded. Please upload to access controller content in the system.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
This controller is out of sync with the server. This particular controller only allows upload.
translation.variant: This controller has a mismatch with the system. Please upload to access controller content.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
This router has been uploaded but no controllers have been discovered under it
translation.variant: Go to the Devices Manage page to find the controllers under this router.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The user must press resolve to clear up differences between a previously installed controller and its replacement
translation.variant: This controller has been replaced by another controller in the field. Either upload all content from controller, download all content to controller, or press details for more information.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The parameters in the field controller differ from those in the system.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The parameters in the field controller differ from those in the system.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The control program or controller is marked for parameter download.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The control program or controller is marked for schedule download.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
An unsupported controller exists but cannot be used in the system
translation.variant: This controller does not support upload.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The controller is not set up to upload programs or does not have the capability
translation.variant: This controller is not configured for content upload.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
A controller exists but it's control programs cannot be used in the system
translation.variant: This controller is not permitted to upload content.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The control programs cannot be used in the controller
translation.variant: This controller is not permitted to download.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
A programmable module exists which does not have any equipment added to it yet.
translation.variant: This is a programmable controller. To add a control program, go to the Devices Manage page and click on the "Add Control Program" button on the top.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The controller has the offline color
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The module is disabled
translation.variant: The controller is out of service. Go to the controller properties page to put it back in service.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
Communications to the controller have been disabled
translation.variant: The connection for this controller has been disabled.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
Communications to the controller failed
translation.variant: The connection for this controller failed to start.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
Communications have been lost to the controller.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
Communications have been lost to the usb controller.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The controller is currently being modified by some process.
translation.variant: This network is in use. {0}% complete. {1}

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The system is importing or creating a clipping.
translation.variant: Clipping operation in progress. Do not make changes, as they may corrupt your system.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The controller is in the list of pending download/upload tasks.
translation.variant: The controller is waiting to be processed

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The controller is currently being downloaded.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The controller is currently being uploaded.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The controller is currently being scanned.
Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The controller failed to upload because of missing source files. {0}
translation.variant: The controller failed to upload because the server is missing source files. {0}

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
The controller state is unknown due to an error. The user can press the details button for more information.
translation.variant: The controller state cannot be determined. Press the Details button for more information.

translation.note: Resources for detailed controller status messages shown in page headers.
translation.variant: The last operation on this controller was cancelled
